attrProjectOnBackFaces.name: project_on_back_faces
attrProjectOnBackFaces.label: project on back faces
attrProjectOnBackFaces.comment: Toggles whether camera projections appear on back faces.

attrTexture.name: texture
attrTexture.comment: filename that points to a texture .exr or .tx file (must be mip-mapped and tiled with maketx).

attrAspectRatioSource.name: aspect_ratio_source
attrAspectRatioSource.label: aspect ratio source
attrAspectRatioSource.comment: Whether to use the image and pixel aspect ratio of the texture being projected, or a custom aspect ratio

attrCustomAspectRatio.name: custom_aspect_ratio
attrCustomAspectRatio.label: custom aspect ratio
attrCustomAspectRatio.comment: a custom aspect ratio for the projected texture

attrNormalEncoding.name: normal_encoding
attrNormalEncoding.label: normal encoding
attrNormalEncoding.comment: Most normal maps are encoded [0,1].   Only certain rare floating point normal maps are encoded [-1,1]
